title: ER docs don smart rings to better predict COVID   infections
description: Some     emergency medical workers in San Francisco are tracking their temperature and other vitals with Oura s smart rings in an attempt to limit the spread of COVID    SF Chronicle reports  Oura and researchers from the University of California San Franc
content: Workers at UCSF Medical Center and Zuckerberg San Francisco General Hospital are wearing the devices  and Oura has asked another     users to share their data  The rings aren t exactly comprehensive trackers  but they do record body temperature  heart rat    chars
